DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to correlate levels of Flt3-ligand in Cerebrospinal Fluid (CSF) and serum to markers for inflammation and degeneration in patients with primary Sjogrens syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Flt3-Ligand Levels in Sj√∂grens Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The study aims to correlate levels of Flt3-ligand in CSF and serum to markers for inflammation and degeneration in patients with primary Sjogrens syndrome.
DOC.criteria: fulfill the ACRcriteria for primary Sjogrens syndrome, age above 18 years old other CNSdisease
